message:
We talk about online safety a lot with Sergeant Marc Marty because it is important for parents and children to understand all aspects of social media. 
We are happy to see more police departments being proactive and educating their community like Cheektowaga Police Department. 
#KnowledgeisPower

attachments.media_description: Cyberspace safety forum to be held at JFK High School | Cheektowaga Chronicle
